channel.title: [317 Delta] Teleport
channel.description:
[img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/1474/examplelu.jpg[/img]
how can i set these up to teleport to the locations?
when i click them, the id doesn't show in the cmd and nothing has been previously set to them.
any help would be great
thanks

item.title: [317 Delta] Teleport
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Yes, you put the println in the wrong place, it needs to be outside of a specific case so it works for every action button.

case 166: [b]c.println_debug("Action Button Id = "+c.actionButtonId);[/b] [i]//<-cut this line[/i]

c.sendQuest(“Mini Games”, 2481);
c.sendQuest(“Barrows”, 2482);
c.sendQuest(“Fight pits”, 2483);
c.sendQuest(“Pest ctrl”, 2484);
c.sendFrame164(2480);
break;

at the top of the file find:

[b]switch(c.actionButtonId) {[/b][i] //<-paste that code above this line[/i]

Now every button or option you click on any interface should be displayed in the cmd.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Teleport
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

[code]
case 166:
c.println_debug("Action Button Id = "+c.actionButtonId);

c.sendQuest(“Mini Games”, 2481);
c.sendQuest(“Barrows”, 2482);
c.sendQuest(“Fight pits”, 2483);
c.sendQuest(“Pest ctrl”, 2484);
c.sendFrame164(2480);
break;[/code]

this shows me the id for the main emote button which i already know, but not for the individual options

any ideas? >.<

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta] Teleport
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Step 1:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:376201”]in your clicking most.java file

need to add a line

public class clickingMost { 
	
public void clicking(int a){
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
		switch(c.actionButtonId) {

c.println_debug("Action Button Id = "+c.actionButtonId); [/quote]

Step 2:
Click on the options:

Step 3:
Check the cmd and it will display the button ID of the 3 options

Step 4:
In your clickingMost.java file
Add:

case ####: c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, h); break;

= button ID

xxxx = x co-ord
yyyy = y co-ord
h = height (default = 0)
